content: this is a generic pattern for you to make your own pony beads and rope i have included diagrams on how to string a lizard octopus and flowers but you can use any beading pattern you d like enjoy your new pony beads connect with me here 1 i do not charge for my patterns but if you would like to support my work you can tip me on venmo @thoseyellowthings 1 https //www flowcode com/page/thoseyellowthings
